title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
This graph displays the relationship between life expectancy (years) and Population (millions)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

gapminder_df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')

plt.scatter(gapminder_df['life_expectancy'], gapminder_df['population_millions'])
plt.show()

title: Gapminder Dataset
text:
This is a Quarto website.
The gapminder dataset contains information about the life expectancy, population, and GDP per capita for 142 countries.
Link Link Link
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
These graphs display the relationship for life expectancy (1), GDP per capita (2), and population over time (3)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

gapminder_df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')
country_df = gapminder_df.loc[gapminder_df['country']=='Afghanistan']

plt.scatter(country_df['year'], country_df['life_expectancy'])
plt.show()

plt.scatter(country_df['year'], country_df['gdp_per_capita'])
plt.show()

plt.scatter(country_df['year'], country_df['population_millions'])
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy and GDP
text:
This graph displays the relationship between life expectancy (years) and GDP per capita ($)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

gapminder_df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')

plt.scatter(gapminder_df['life_expectancy'], gapminder_df['gdp_per_capita'])
plt.show()
